channel.title: Aer on CamMakoJ
channel.description: Recent content in Aer on CamMakoJ

item.title: AER Shapefile Submissions
item.description: The AER One Stop is a great regulator solution to some of the uncertainty in project delivery, such as to who to send what to. However it has created some confusion on its own that I have dealt with when formatting shapefiles for upload to the site. I have really only used this feature as part of Water Activities and they have since released guidelines on how to ensure your shapefile complies with their filters.
